pr_title: Add validation of the certificate fields.

timeline.message: fix: Add validation of the certificate fields.
refactor: Avoid checking duplicates if alias blank.

timeline.bodyText: This method and the method below this both take a customCertificateModel. How does a user of the API know which validate to call?
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: The method below is private so they wouldn't know it exists. I can change the public method to validateCertificateContents.  I am just validating that the content is in fact a certificate we can parse and potentially load.
replies.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Ah, I see. I would still prefer if there was more distinction between what the methods do.
replies.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: I have a change I will push soon to better distinguish between the two.  It's a valid point.  Naming things is always the fun part.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: refactor: Rename a validation method per PR feedback.
